section.name: Magnolia Developer List

p.strong: You are welcome to join the developer list

section.p: Discussion on the developer list centers around building the best content management system in the world. If you want to know how to do whatever with Magnolia, this is the wrong place to ask, and if you get an answer at all, it will probably be spelled: "you are on the wrong list". Check out the user-list instead.

Now, after the above, if you are still with us, to subscribe send a mail to: dev-list-subscribe@magnolia.info to post send mails to: dev-list@magnolia.info Please note the following:
We accept attachments on this list, and therefore have to allow "HTML" mail. However, please set your email client to send plain text email. If you are a windows user, by default that requirement will not be met.
Please read
"Configuring Mail Clients to Send Plain ASCII Text"
to understand what is wrong with non-ASCII mail and what you can do about it.
Here is an archive
Trim your replies. That means do not simply hit "Reply" and start typing. Remove anything that is not directly relevant to your reply before you start typing. We all have the previous mail in our inbox,there is no need to have the whole thread copied into each reply.
Be concise - provide as much detail as necessary and as little as possible to state your case.
You can unsubscribe at any time by sending an empty email to dev-list-off@magnolia.info
To switch to the DIGEST mode, send an empty email to dev-list-digest@magnolia.info
To switch to the INDEX mode, send an empty email to dev-list-index@magnolia.info
For any administrative enquieries, please use user-list-request@magnolia.info
